mapper.update: UPDATE CommunityBoard SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_uri = #{fileUri}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt}, category = #{category} WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num, title, writer, content, view_cnt, file_name, file_uri, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, category FROM CommunityBoard WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT num, title, writer, content, view_cnt, file_name, file_uri, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, category FROM CommunityBoard WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE '%${keyword}%') AND category = #{category}

SELECT num, title, writer, content, view_cnt, file_name, file_uri, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, category FROM CommunityBoard WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE '%${keyword}%') AND category = #{category} ORDER BY reg_date DESC
